5) Îπ†Î•∏ Ï≤¥ÌÅ¨Î¶¨Ïä§Ìä∏

  • /-2/index.html ÏïàÏùò <title>Ïù¥ ‚ÄúÍ∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞‚Äù

  • /-2/index.html?v=12345Î°ú Ï†ëÏÜçÌïòÎ©¥ ÏÉà ÌôîÎ©¥ Î≥¥ÏûÑ

  • /-2/ Ìè¥ÎçîÏóê index.htmlÏù¥ Ïã§Ï†úÎ°ú Ï°¥Ïû¨

  • Pages SourceÍ∞Ä main/Î£®Ìä∏

  • Í∞ïÎ†• ÏÉàÎ°úÍ≥†Ïπ® ÎòêÎäî ÏÉà Ìè¥Îçî Í≤ΩÎ°ú(bulky/)Î°ú ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏

Î∞îÎ°ú Ìï¥Í≤∞ ÏõêÌïòÏãúÎ©¥

ÏõêÌïòÏãúÎ©¥ Ï†úÍ∞Ä ÎìúÎ¶∞ ÏôÑÏÑ± HTMLÏùÑ Îã§Ïãú Ìïú Î≤à Î∂ôÏó¨ÎÑ£Í∏∞Ïö© ÏΩîÎìúÎ°ú Î≥¥ÎÇ¥ÎìúÎ¶¥Í≤åÏöî.
ÎòêÎäî ‚ÄúÏÉà Ìè¥Îçî bulky/ ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞‚Äù Î∞©ÏãùÏúºÎ°ú Î∞∞Ìè¨Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÍ≤å ÏµúÏ¢Ö index.html Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ ÏΩîÎìúÎ•º Î∞îÎ°ú Ï†ÑÎã¨Ìï¥ÎìúÎ¶¥ÍπåÏöî?

ÎÇòÏùò Îßê:
ÎÑ§
ChatGPTÏùò Îßê:

Ï¢ãÏïÑÏöî! ÏÉà Í≤ΩÎ°úÎ°ú Î∞îÎ°ú Î∞òÏòÅÎêòÎèÑÎ°ù bulky/index.html ÌååÏùºÏùÑ ÎßåÎì§Ïñ¥ Ïò¨Î¶¨Î©¥ Ï∫êÏãú ÏòÅÌñ• ÏóÜÏù¥ ÌôïÏù∏Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏñ¥Ïöî.
ÏïÑÎûò ÏôÑÏÑ± ÏÜåÏä§ Ï†ÑÏ≤¥Î•º Í∑∏ÎåÄÎ°ú Î≥µÏÇ¨Ìï¥ÏÑú index.htmlÎ°ú Ï†ÄÏû•Ìï¥ jsh0333/jsh0333.github.io/bulky/index.html Ïóê ÏóÖÎ°úÎìúÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.

1) ÏóÖÎ°úÎìú ÏàúÏÑú (ÏöîÏïΩ)

  1. Ï†ÄÏû•ÏÜå Ï†ëÏÜç: https://github.com/jsh0333/jsh0333.github.io

  2. Add file ‚Üí Create new file

  3. ÌååÏùºÎ™ÖÏóê bulky/index.html ÏûÖÎ†•

  4. ÏïÑÎûò ÏΩîÎìúÎ•º Ï†ÑÎ∂Ä Î∂ôÏó¨ÎÑ£Í∏∞ ‚Üí Commit changes

  5. Ï†ëÏÜç ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏: https://jsh0333.github.io/bulky/ (Ïïà Î∞îÎÄåÎ©¥ ?v=1 Î∂ôÏó¨ ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏)

2) bulky/index.html Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ ÏΩîÎìú

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
<title>Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞</title>
<style>
  :root { --bg:#f8fafc; --card:#fff; --border:#e5e7eb; --text:#111827; --muted:#6b7280; --primary:#111827; }
  *{ box-sizing:border-box; }
  body{ margin:0; font-family:system-ui,-apple-system,Segoe UI,Roboto,Apple SD Gothic Neo,Noto Sans KR,sans-serif; background:var(--bg); color:var(--text); }
  .container{ max-width:960px; margin:0 auto; padding:24px; }
  h1{ font-size:24px; font-weight:800; text-align:center; margin:0 0 8px; }
  p.lead{ text-align:center; color:var(--muted); font-size:13px; margin:0 0 24px; }
  .grid{ display:grid; grid-template-columns:1fr; gap:16px; }
  @media(min-width:900px){ .grid{ grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr; } }
  .card{ background:var(--card); border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:16px; padding:16px; box-shadow:0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.03); }
  .title{ font-weight:700; margin-bottom:12px; }
  .row{ display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:space-between; gap:12px; border-bottom:1px solid var(--border); padding:8px 0; }
  .row:last-child{ border-bottom:none; }
  .muted{ color:var(--muted); font-size:12px; }
  .input, .select{ width:140px; padding:8px 10px; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:10px; font-size:14px; }
  .btn{ border:1px solid var(--border); background:#fff; padding:8px 12px; border-radius:10px; font-size:13px; cursor:pointer; }
  .btn.primary{ background:var(--primary); color:#fff; border-color:var(--primary); }
  .chip{ border:1px solid var(--border); padding:6px 10px; border-radius:999px; font-size:12px; cursor:pointer; background:#fff; }
  .chip.active{ background:#111827; color:#fff; border-color:#111827; }
  .grid-items{ display:grid; grid-template-columns:1fr; gap:8px; }
  @media(min-width:520px){ .grid-items{ grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr; } }
  .item{ display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:space-between; gap:10px; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:12px; padding:10px 12px; }
  .pill{ background:#f3f4f6; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:12px; padding:12px; text-align:center; }
  .flex{ display:flex; gap:8px; flex-wrap:wrap; }
</style>
</head>
<body>
  <div class="container" id="app">
    <h1>Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞</h1>
    <p class="lead">ÏßÄÏûêÏ≤¥ ÎåÄÌòïÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º Ïã†Í≥†/Ïä§Ìã∞Ïª§Îäî Í≥†Í∞ù Ïã§ÎπÑ Î∂ÄÎã¥Ïù¥Î©∞, Î≥∏ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞Îäî ÏàòÍ±∞¬∑Ïö¥Î∞ò ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ ÏöîÍ∏à ÏòàÏãúÏûÖÎãàÎã§.</p>

    <div class="grid">
      <section class="card">
        <div class="title">Í≥†Í∞ù ÏûÖÎ†•</div>
        <div class="row">
          <div>
            <div>Í±∞Î¶¨ (ÏôïÎ≥µ km)</div>
            <div class="muted">Í∏∞Î≥∏ <span id="cfgBaseKmLabel"></span>km Ìè¨Ìï®, Ï¥àÍ≥º kmÎãπ <span id="cfgPerKmLabel"></span>Ïõê</div>
          </div>
          <input class="input" type="number" id="distanceKm" value="8" />
        </div>

        <div class="row">
          <div>Ï∏µÏàò</div>
          <input class="input" type="number" id="floors" value="1" />
        </div>

        <div class="row">
          <div>ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞</div>
          <div class="flex">
            <button class="chip active" id="elevYes">ÏûàÏùå</button>
            <button class="chip" id="elevNo">ÏóÜÏùå</button>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div class="row">
          <div>Î≥¥Ï°∞ Ïù∏Î†•</div>
          <input class="input" type="number" id="helpers" value="0" />
        </div>

        <div class="row">
          <div>Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ</div>
          <div class="flex">
            <button class="chip" id="wkNo">ÎØ∏Ï†ÅÏö©</button>
            <button class="chip active" id="wkYes">Ï†ÅÏö©</button>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div style="margin:12px 0 6px; font-weight:600">ÌíàÎ™© ÏàòÎüâ</div>
        <div class="grid-items" id="itemsList"></div>
      </section>

      <section class="card">
        <div class="title">ÏòàÏÉÅ ÏöîÍ∏à</div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">Í∏∞Î≥∏ÏöîÍ∏à</div><div id="vBase">-</div></div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">ÌíàÎ™© Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌï©</div><div id="vItems">-</div></div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">Í±∞Î¶¨ Ï∂îÍ∞Ä</div><div id="vDist">-</div></div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">Ï∏µÏàò Ï∂îÍ∞Ä(Î¨¥ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞)</div><div id="vFloor">-</div></div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">Î≥¥Ï°∞ Ïù∏Î†•</div><div id="vHelper">-</div></div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπò</div><div id="vMul">√ó 1.00</div></div>

        <div class="pill" style="margin:14px 0">
          <div class="muted">Í≥†Í∞ù Í≤∞Ï†ú ÏòàÏÉÅ</div>
          <div style="font-weight:800; font-size:22px" id="vTotal">-</div>
        </div>

        <div class="flex">
          <button class="btn" id="btnCopy">Í≤¨Ï†Å ÎÇ¥Ïö© Î≥µÏÇ¨</button>
          <button class="btn primary" id="btnPDF">PDF Í≤¨Ï†ÅÏÑú Îã§Ïö¥Î°úÎìú</button>
          <button class="btn" id="btnShare">Í≥µÏú†</button>
        </div>
        <div class="muted" style="margin-top:8px">‚Äª ÏßÄÏûêÏ≤¥ ÎåÄÌòïÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º Ïä§Ìã∞Ïª§ ÎπÑÏö©ÏùÄ Î≥ÑÎèÑ(Ïã§ÎπÑ)ÏûÖÎãàÎã§.</div>
      </section>
    </div>

    <details class="card" style="margin-top:18px" open>
      <summary class="title" style="cursor:pointer">Ïö¥ÏòÅÏûê ÏÑ§Ï†ï</summary>
      <div class="grid" style="grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr">
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">ÏÉÅÌò∏/Î∏åÎûúÎìú</span><input class="input" id="bizName" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Ïó∞ÎùΩÏ≤ò</span><input class="input" id="bizPhone" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Ïù¥Î©îÏùº</span><input class="input" id="bizEmail" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Í∏∞Î≥∏ÏöîÍ∏à</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgBaseFee" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Í∏∞Î≥∏Í±∞Î¶¨(km)</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgBaseKm" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Ï¥àÍ≥º kmÎãπ</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgPerKm" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Î¨¥ÏóòÎ≤† Ï∏µÎãπ</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgNoElev" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ Í∞ÄÏÇ∞Ïú®(Ïòà:0.2)</span><input class="input" type="number" step="0.01" id="cfgWeekend" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Î≥¥Ï°∞ 1Ïù∏ ÎπÑÏö©</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgHelper" /></label>
      </div>

      <div style="margin-top:12px; font-weight:700">ÌíàÎ™© Îã®Í∞Ä</div>
      <div id="adminItems"></div>
      <div class="flex" style="margin-top:8px">
        <button class="btn" id="addItem">+ ÌíàÎ™© Ï∂îÍ∞Ä</button>
        <button class="btn" id="applyItems">Îã®Í∞Ä Ï†ÅÏö©</button>
      </div>

      <div class="flex" style="margin-top:12px">
        <button class="btn" id="btnExport">ÏÑ§Ï†ï ÎÇ¥Î≥¥ÎÇ¥Í∏∞</button>
        <button class="btn" id="btnImport">ÏÑ§Ï†ï Î∂àÎü¨Ïò§Í∏∞</button>
        <button class="btn" id="btnReset">Í∏∞Î≥∏Í∞í Î≥µÏõê</button>
      </div>
    </details>
  </div>

  <!-- jsPDF CDN -->
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jspdf@2.5.1/dist/jspdf.umd.min.js"></script>

  <script>
    // ---------- Utilities ----------
    const KR = n => (Number(n)||0).toLocaleString('ko-KR');
    const $ = sel => document.querySelector(sel);
    const el = (tag, attrs={}, children=[]) => {
      const d = document.createElement(tag);
      Object.entries(attrs).forEach(([k,v]) => {
        if(k==='class') d.className = v;
        else if(k==='text') d.textContent = v;
        else if(k==='value') d.value = v;
        else d.setAttribute(k,v);
      });
      children.forEach(c => d.appendChild(c));
      return d;
    };

    // ---------- Default Config ----------
    const DEF = {
      bizName: '',
      bizPhone: '',
      bizEmail: '',
      baseFee: 120000,
      baseDistanceKm: 10,
      extraPerKm: 1000,
      noElevPerFloor: 5000,
      weekendRate: 0.2,
      helperFee: 50000,
      items: [
        { id:'fridge', label:'ÎÉâÏû•Í≥†(Ï§ë/ÎåÄ)', price:20000, unitLabel:'ÎåÄ' },
        { id:'washer', label:'ÏÑ∏ÌÉÅÍ∏∞', price:15000, unitLabel:'ÎåÄ' },
        { id:'drum', label:'ÎìúÎüº ÏÑ∏ÌÉÅÍ∏∞', price:20000, unitLabel:'ÎåÄ' },
        { id:'bed_s', label:'Ïπ®ÎåÄ(Ïã±Í∏Ä/ÎçîÎ∏î)', price:10000, unitLabel:'ÏÑ∏Ìä∏' },
        { id:'bed_l', label:'Ïπ®ÎåÄ(ÎåÄÌòï)', price:20000, unitLabel:'ÏÑ∏Ìä∏' },
        { id:'wardrobe', label:'Ïû•Î°±(2~3Ïπ∏)', price:30000, unitLabel:'Í∞ú' },
        { id:'desk', label:'Ï±ÖÏÉÅ/Ï±ÖÏû•', price:10000, unitLabel:'Í∞ú' },
        { id:'small', label:'ÏÜåÌòïÍ∞ÄÍµ¨', price:5000, unitLabel:'Í∞ú' },
      ]
    };
    const LSKEY = 'haul_embed_cfg_v1';

    let CFG = loadCfg();
    let STATE = {
      distanceKm: 8,
      floors: 1,
      hasElevator: true,
      helpers: 0,
      weekend: true,
      items: Object.fromEntries((CFG.items||[]).map(i=>[i.id,0]))
    };

    function loadCfg(){
      try{ const raw = localStorage.getItem(LSKEY); if(raw){ return JSON.parse(raw); } }catch{}
      return JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(DEF));
    }
    function saveCfg(){ try{ localStorage.setItem(LSKEY, JSON.stringify(CFG)); }catch{} }

    // ---------- Calculator ----------
    function itemsSum(){
      return (CFG.items||[]).reduce((sum, i)=> sum + (Number(STATE.items[i.id]||0) * (Number(i.price)||0)), 0);
    }
    function calc(){
      const base = Number(CFG.baseFee)||0;
      const distExtra = Math.max(0, (Number(STATE.distanceKm)||0) - (Number(CFG.baseDistanceKm)||0)) * (Number(CFG.extraPerKm)||0);
      const floorExtra = STATE.hasElevator ? 0 : Math.max(0, Number(STATE.floors)||0) * (Number(CFG.noElevPerFloor)||0);
      const helperExtra = (Number(STATE.helpers)||0) * (Number(CFG.helperFee)||0);
      const subtotal = base + itemsSum() + distExtra + floorExtra + helperExtra;
      const weekendMul = STATE.weekend ? (1 + (Number(CFG.weekendRate)||0)) : 1;
      const total = Math.round(subtotal * weekendMul);

      $('#vBase').textContent   = KR(base) + 'Ïõê';
      $('#vItems').textContent  = KR(itemsSum()) + 'Ïõê';
      $('#vDist').textContent   = KR(distExtra) + 'Ïõê';
      $('#vFloor').textContent  = KR(floorExtra) + 'Ïõê';
      $('#vHelper').textContent = KR(helperExtra) + 'Ïõê';
      $('#vMul').textContent    = '√ó ' + weekendMul.toFixed(2);
      $('#vTotal').textContent  = KR(total) + 'Ïõê';
    }
    function refreshLabels(){
      $('#cfgBaseKmLabel').textContent = CFG.baseDistanceKm;
      $('#cfgPerKmLabel').textContent = KR(CFG.extraPerKm);
    }

    // ---------- Customer Items UI ----------
    function bindItems(){
      const wrap = $('#itemsList');
      wrap.innerHTML = '';
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach(it => {
        const qty = Number(STATE.items[it.id]||0);
        const row = el('div', { class:'item' }, [
          el('div', {}, [
            el('div', { text: it.label, class:'title', style:'font-weight:600; font-size:14px' }),
            el('div', { text: (it.unitLabel||'Í∞ú') + 'Îãπ ' + KR(it.price) + 'Ïõê', class:'muted' })
          ]),
          el('div', {}, [
            el('input', { class:'input', type:'number', value: qty, id: 'qty_'+it.id })
          ])
        ]);
        wrap.appendChild(row);
        row.querySelector('input').addEventListener('input', e=>{
          STATE.items[it.id] = Number(e.target.value||0);
          calc();
        });
      });
    }

    // ---------- Admin UI ----------
    function bindAdmin(){
      $('#bizName').value = CFG.bizName||'';
      $('#bizPhone').value = CFG.bizPhone||'';
      $('#bizEmail').value = CFG.bizEmail||'';
      $('#cfgBaseFee').value = CFG.baseFee;
      $('#cfgBaseKm').value = CFG.baseDistanceKm;
      $('#cfgPerKm').value = CFG.extraPerKm;
      $('#cfgNoElev').value = CFG.noElevPerFloor;
      $('#cfgWeekend').value = CFG.weekendRate;
      $('#cfgHelper').value = CFG.helperFee;
      refreshLabels();

      const adminWrap = $('#adminItems');
      adminWrap.innerHTML = '';
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach((it, idx)=>{
        const row = el('div', { class:'row' }, [
          el('input', { class:'input', value:it.label }),
          el('input', { class:'input', value:it.unitLabel||'Í∞ú' }),
          el('input', { class:'input', type:'number', value:it.price }),
          el('button', { class:'btn', text:'ÏÇ≠Ï†ú' })
        ]);
        const [iLabel, iUnit, iPrice, btnDel] = row.querySelectorAll('input,button');
        iLabel.addEventListener('input', e=> { CFG.items[idx].label = e.target.value; saveCfg(); bindItems(); });
        iUnit.addEventListener('input', e=> { CFG.items[idx].unitLabel = e.target.value; saveCfg(); bindItems(); });
        iPrice.addEventListener('input', e=> { CFG.items[idx].price = Number(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); bindItems(); });
        btnDel.addEventListener('click', ()=>{ CFG.items.splice(idx,1); saveCfg(); bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc(); });
        adminWrap.appendChild(row);
      });
    }

    // Admin: events
    $('#bizName').addEventListener('input', e=>{ CFG.bizName = e.target.value; saveCfg(); });
    $('#bizPhone').addEventListener('input', e=>{ CFG.bizPhone = e.target.value; saveCfg(); });
    $('#bizEmail').addEventListener('input', e=>{ CFG.bizEmail = e.target.value; saveCfg(); });
    $('#cfgBaseFee').addEventListener('input', e=>{ CFG.baseFee = Number(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgBaseKm').addEventListener('input', e=>{ CFG.baseDistanceKm = Number(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); refreshLabels(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgPerKm').addEventListener('input', e=>{ CFG.extraPerKm = Number(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); refreshLabels(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgNoElev').addEventListener('input', e=>{ CFG.noElevPerFloor = Number(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgWeekend').addEventListener('input', e=>{ CFG.weekendRate = Number(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgHelper').addEventListener('input', e=>{ CFG.helperFee = Number(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });
    $('#addItem').addEventListener('click', ()=>{
      const id = 'itm_' + Math.random().toString(36).slice(2,8);
      CFG.items.push({ id, label:'ÏÉà ÌíàÎ™©', price:0, unitLabel:'Í∞ú' });
      saveCfg();
      STATE.items[id] = 0;
      bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc();
    });
    $('#applyItems').addEventListener('click', ()=>{ saveCfg(); bindItems(); calc(); });
    $('#btnExport').addEventListener('click', async ()=> {
      const text = JSON.stringify(CFG, null, 2);
      try { await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text); alert('ÏÑ§Ï†ïÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶ΩÎ≥¥ÎìúÏóê Î≥µÏÇ¨ÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.'); }
      catch { alert(text); }
    });
    $('#btnImport').addEventListener('click', ()=> {
      const text = prompt('Î∂ôÏó¨ÎÑ£Í∏∞ Ìï† ÏÑ§Ï†ï JSONÏùÑ ÏûÖÎ†•ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî:');
      if(!text) return;
      try { CFG = JSON.parse(text); saveCfg(); bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc(); }
      catch { alert('JSON ÌååÏã± Ïã§Ìå®'); }
    });
    $('#btnReset').addEventListener('click', ()=> {
      CFG = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(DEF));
      saveCfg(); bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc();
    });

    // ---------- Customer inputs ----------
    $('#distanceKm').addEventListener('input', e=> { STATE.distanceKm = Number(e.target.value||0); calc(); });
    $('#floors').addEventListener('input', e=> { STATE.floors = Number(e.target.value||0); calc(); });
    $('#helpers').addEventListener('input', e=> { STATE.helpers = Number(e.target.value||0); calc(); });

    function setElev(has){
      STATE.hasElevator = has;
      $('#elevYes').classList.toggle('active', has);
      $('#elevNo').classList.toggle('active', !has);
      calc();
    }
    $('#elevYes').addEventListener('click', ()=> setElev(true));
    $('#elevNo').addEventListener('click', ()=> setElev(false));

    function setWeekend(on){
      STATE.weekend = on;
      $('#wkYes').classList.toggle('active', on);
      $('#wkNo').classList.toggle('active', !on);
      calc();
    }
    $('#wkYes').addEventListener('click', ()=> setWeekend(true));
    $('#wkNo').addEventListener('click', ()=> setWeekend(false));

    // ---------- Share/Copy/PDF ----------
    function buildQuoteText(){
      const date = new Date().toLocaleString();
      const itemsStr = (CFG.items||[])
        .map(i => `${i.label} ${STATE.items[i.id]||0}${i.unitLabel||'Í∞ú'}`)
        .filter(s => !/ 0$/.test(s))
        .join('\n');

      const base = Number(CFG.baseFee)||0;
      const distExtra = Math.max(0, (Number(STATE.distanceKm)||0) - (Number(CFG.baseDistanceKm)||0)) * (Number(CFG.extraPerKm)||0);
      const floorExtra = STATE.hasElevator ? 0 : Math.max(0, Number(STATE.floors)||0) * (Number(CFG.noElevPerFloor)||0);
      const helperExtra = (Number(STATE.helpers)||0) * (Number(CFG.helperFee)||0);
      const subtotal = base + itemsSum() + distExtra + floorExtra + helperExtra;
      const weekendMul = STATE.weekend ? (1 + (Number(CFG.weekendRate)||0)) : 1;
      const total = Math.round(subtotal * weekendMul);

      const lines = [
        `[Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ Í≤¨Ï†Å]`,
        `ÏùºÏãú: ${date}`,
        CFG.bizName ? `ÏóÖÏ≤¥: ${CFG.bizName}` : null,
        CFG.bizPhone ? `Ïó∞ÎùΩÏ≤ò: ${CFG.bizPhone}` : null,
        CFG.bizEmail ? `Ïù¥Î©îÏùº: ${CFG.bizEmail}` : null,
        ``,
        `Í±∞Î¶¨(ÏôïÎ≥µ): ${STATE.distanceKm}km`,
        `Ï∏µÏàò: ${STATE.floors}Ï∏µ / ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ${STATE.hasElevator?'ÏûàÏùå':'ÏóÜÏùå'}`,
        `Î≥¥Ï°∞ Ïù∏Î†•: ${STATE.helpers}Î™Ö`,
        `Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ: ${STATE.weekend?'Ï†ÅÏö©':'ÎØ∏Ï†ÅÏö©'}`,
        ``,
        itemsStr ? `ÌíàÎ™©:\n${itemsStr}` : `ÌíàÎ™©: ÏóÜÏùå`,
        ``,
        `ÏòàÏÉÅ Í≤∞Ï†ú Í∏àÏï°: ${KR(total)}Ïõê`,
        `(ÎåÄÌòïÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º Ïä§Ìã∞Ïª§ ÎπÑÏö© Î≥ÑÎèÑ)`
      ].filter(Boolean);
      return lines.join('\n');
    }

    $('#btnCopy').addEventListener('click', async ()=> {
      const text = buildQuoteText();
      try { await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text); alert('Í≤¨Ï†Å ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶ΩÎ≥¥ÎìúÏóê Î≥µÏÇ¨ÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.'); }
      catch { alert(text); }
    });

    $('#btnShare').addEventListener('click', ()=> {
      const text = buildQuoteText();
      if (navigator.share) {
        navigator.share({ title:'Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ Í≤¨Ï†Å', text });
      } else {
        alert('Ïù¥ Î∏åÎùºÏö∞Ï†ÄÎäî Í≥µÏú† Í∏∞Îä•ÏùÑ ÏßÄÏõêÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÏäµÎãàÎã§. Î≥µÏÇ¨ Í∏∞Îä•ÏùÑ Ïù¥Ïö©ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.');
      }
    });

    $('#btnPDF').addEventListener('click', ()=> {
      const { jsPDF } = window.jspdf;
      const doc = new jsPDF();
      const left = 14; let y = 20;
      doc.setFontSize(16); doc.text('Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ Í≤¨Ï†ÅÏÑú', left, y); y += 8;
      doc.setFontSize(11);
      const bizLine = [CFG.bizName, CFG.bizPhone, CFG.bizEmail].filter(Boolean).join('  ‚Ä¢  ');
      if (bizLine) { doc.text(bizLine, left, y); y += 8; }
      doc.text(`ÏûëÏÑ±ÏùºÏãú: ${new Date().toLocaleString()}`, left, y); y += 10;

      const rows = [];
      rows.push(['Í±∞Î¶¨(ÏôïÎ≥µ)', `${STATE.distanceKm} km`]);
      rows.push(['Ï∏µÏàò/ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞', `${STATE.floors}Ï∏µ / ${STATE.hasElevator?'ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏûàÏùå':'ÏóÜÏùå'}`]);
      rows.push(['Î≥¥Ï°∞ Ïù∏Î†•', `${STATE.helpers} Î™Ö`]);
      rows.push(['Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ', STATE.weekend?'Ï†ÅÏö©':'ÎØ∏Ï†ÅÏö©' ]);
      rows.forEach(r=> { doc.text(`${r[0]}: ${r[1]}`, left, y); y += 7; });

      y += 3;
      doc.setFont(undefined, 'bold'); doc.text('ÌíàÎ™©', left, y); doc.setFont(undefined, 'normal'); y += 7;
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach(i=>{
        const qty = Number(STATE.items[i.id]||0);
        if(qty>0){ doc.text(`- ${i.label}: ${qty}${i.unitLabel||'Í∞ú'}`, left, y); y += 6; }
      });

      const base = Number(CFG.baseFee)||0;
      const distExtra = Math.max(0, (Number(STATE.distanceKm)||0) - (Number(CFG.baseDistanceKm)||0)) * (Number(CFG.extraPerKm)||0);
      const floorExtra = STATE.hasElevator ? 0 : Math.max(0, Number(STATE.floors)||0) * (Number(CFG.noElevPerFloor)||0);
      const helperExtra = (Number(STATE.helpers)||0) * (Number(CFG.helperFee)||0);
      const subtotal = base + itemsSum() + distExtra + floorExtra + helperExtra;
      const weekendMul = STATE.weekend ? (1 + (Number(CFG.weekendRate)||0)) : 1;
      const total = Math.round(subtotal * weekendMul);

      y += 4;
      doc.setFont(undefined, 'bold'); doc.text(`ÏòàÏÉÅ Í≤∞Ï†ú Í∏àÏï°: ${KR(total)}Ïõê`, left, y); doc.setFont(undefined, 'normal'); y += 8;
      doc.setFontSize(10); doc.text('‚Äª ÏßÄÏûêÏ≤¥ ÎåÄÌòïÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º Ïä§Ìã∞Ïª§ ÎπÑÏö©ÏùÄ Î≥ÑÎèÑ(Ïã§ÎπÑ)ÏûÖÎãàÎã§.', left, y);
      doc.save('Í≤¨Ï†ÅÏÑú.pdf');
    });

    // ---------- Init ----------
    bindAdmin();
    bindItems();
    calc();

    // ---------- Dev Tests ----------
    (function runDevTests(){
      try{
        const t = (function(){ return 'ÏòàÏÉÅ Í≤∞Ï†ú Í∏àÏï°:'; })();
        console.assert(t.includes('ÏòàÏÉÅ Í≤∞Ï†ú Í∏àÏï°'), 'Í∏àÏï° Ï∂úÎ†• ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏ Ïã§Ìå®');
        const id0 = CFG.items[0].id; STATE.items[id0] = 2;
        const t2 = (function(){
          return (CFG.items||[]).map(i=>`${i.label} ${STATE.items[i.id]||0}${i.unitLabel||'Í∞ú'}`).join(',');
        })();
        console.assert(t2.includes('2'), 'ÌíàÎ™© ÏàòÎüâ Î∞òÏòÅ ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏ Ïã§Ìå®');
      } catch(e){ console.warn('DevTests Ïã§Ìå®:', e); }
    })();
  </script>

  <!-- (ÏÑ†ÌÉù) Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Ïóê ÏûÑÎ≤†ÎìúÌï† Îïå ÏûêÎèô ÎÜíÏù¥ Ï°∞Ï†à -->
  <script>
    function postHeight() {
      try {
        var h = document.documentElement.scrollHeight;
        parent.postMessage({ type: 'CALC_RESIZE', height: h }, '*');
      } catch (e) {}
    }
    window.addEventListener('load', postHeight);
    window.addEventListener('resize', postHeight);
    setTimeout(postHeight, 300);
  </script>
</body>
</html>

ÌïÑÏöîÌïòÎ©¥ ÏúÑ ÌååÏùºÏùÑ /-2/index.htmlÏóêÎèÑ ÎèôÏùºÌïòÍ≤å ÎÑ£Ïñ¥ Í∏∞Ï°¥ Ï£ºÏÜåÏóêÏÑú Ïó¥Î¶¨Í≤å Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏñ¥Ïöî.
Î®ºÏ†Ä bulky/ Í≤ΩÎ°úÎ°ú Ï†ïÏÉÅ ÎèôÏûë ÌôïÏù∏ ‚Üí Ïù¥ÌõÑ -2/ÎèÑ ÍµêÏ≤¥ÌïòÏãúÍ∏∏ Í∂åÏû•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§.

ÏõêÌïòÏãúÎ©¥ ÏÉÅÌò∏/Ïó∞ÎùΩÏ≤ò/Ïù¥Î©îÏùºÏùÑ Í∏∞Î≥∏Í∞íÏúºÎ°ú Î∞ïÏïÑÎëî Î≤ÑÏ†ÑÎèÑ Î∞îÎ°ú ÎßåÎì§Ïñ¥ ÎìúÎ¶¥Í≤åÏöî.

ÎÇòÏùò Îßê:
Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞ ÌîÑÎ°úÍ∑∏Îû®ÏùÑ ÎÇ¥ Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Ïóê ÏÑ§Ïπò Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÍ≤å ÎèÑÏôÄÏ§ò
ChatGPTÏùò Îßê:

Ï¢ãÏïÑÏöî! Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Ïóê Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ‚ÄúÎåÄÌñâ‚Äù Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞Î•º Î∞îÎ°ú ÏÑ§ÏπòÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÍ≤å Îëê Í∞ÄÏßÄ Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÑ ÎìúÎ¶¥Í≤åÏöî.
(Îëò Ï§ë Ìé∏Ìïú Ï™ΩÏùÑ ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî)

Î∞©Î≤ï A) ÍπÉÌóàÎ∏å ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÏóê Ïò¨Î¶¨Í≥†, Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ÏóêÎäî ÏûÑÎ≤†Îìú(Ï∂îÏ≤ú)

1) ÍπÉÌóàÎ∏åÏóê ÏóÖÎ°úÎìú

  1. Ï†ÄÏû•ÏÜå Ïó¥Í∏∞: https://github.com/jsh0333/jsh0333.github.io

  2. Add file ‚Üí Create new file

  3. ÌååÏùºÎ™ÖÏóê bulky/index.html ÏûÖÎ†•

  4. ÏïÑÎûò Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ ÏΩîÎìúÎ•º Î∂ôÏó¨ÎÑ£Í≥† Commit changes

  5. ÌôïÏù∏: https://jsh0333.github.io/bulky/?v=1 Ï†ëÏÜç (Î≥¥Ïù¥Î©¥ ÏÑ±Í≥µ)

2) Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ Î≥∏Î¨∏Ïóê ÏûÑÎ≤†Îìú

HTML Ìé∏Ïßë(ÏÜåÏä§ Î™®Îìú)ÏóêÏÑú ÏïÑÎûò ÏΩîÎìú Î∂ôÏó¨ÎÑ£Í∏∞:

html
<!-- Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞ ÏûÑÎ≤†Îìú -->
<div style="max-width:980px;margin:0 auto">
  <iframe
    src="https://jsh0333.github.io/bulky/"
    title="Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞"
    style="width:100%;height:1600px;border:0;border-radius:12px;overflow:hidden"
    loading="lazy"
    referrerpolicy="no-referrer"
  ></iframe>
  <div style="text-align:center;margin-top:10px">
    <a href="https://jsh0333.github.io/bulky/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"
       style="display:inline-block;padding:10px 14px;border-radius:10px;border:1px solid #e5e7eb;text-decoration:none;color:#111827">
      ÏÉà Ï∞ΩÏóêÏÑú Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞ Ïó¥Í∏∞
    </a>
  </div>
</div>

(ÏÑ†ÌÉù) ÏûêÎèô ÎÜíÏù¥ Ï°∞Ï†à Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î¶ΩÌä∏(Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ÏóêÏÑú <script> ÌóàÏö©Îê† ÎïåÎßå):

html
<script>
  window.addEventListener('message',function(e){
    if(!e.data||e.data.type!=='CALC_RESIZE') return;
    var ifr=document.querySelector('iframe[src*="/bulky/"]');
    if(ifr) ifr.style.height=(e.data.height||1600)+'px';
  });
</script>

Î∞©Î≤ï B) Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Ïóê ÌååÏùº ÏûêÏ≤¥Î•º Ïò¨Î†§ Îã®ÎèÖ ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÎ°ú ÏÇ¨Ïö©

  • ÏõåÎìúÌîÑÎ†àÏä§: ‚ÄúÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄ ‚Üí ÏÉàÎ°ú ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞ ‚Üí HTML Ìé∏Ïßë‚ÄùÏóê Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ ÏΩîÎìú Í∑∏ÎåÄÎ°ú Î∂ôÏó¨ÎÑ£Í∏∞

  • Ìã∞Ïä§ÌÜ†Î¶¨/ÎÑ§Ïù¥Î≤Ñ: HTML(ÏÜåÏä§) ÏûÖÎ†• Í∞ÄÎä•ÌïòÎ©¥ Î∂ôÏó¨ÎÑ£Í∏∞ (Ïïà ÎêòÎ©¥ Î∞©Î≤ï A ÏÇ¨Ïö© Í∂åÏû•)

‚úÖ ‚ÄúÍ∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞‚Äù HTML (Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ ÏΩîÎìú)

ÏïÑÎûòÎ•º Í∑∏ÎåÄÎ°ú bulky/index.htmlÎ°ú Ï†ÄÏû•Ìï¥ Ïò¨Î¶¨Î©¥ Îê©ÎãàÎã§.
(ÏÉÅÌò∏/Ïó∞ÎùΩÏ≤ò/Ïù¥Î©îÏùºÏùÄ Ïö¥ÏòÅÏûê ÏÑ§Ï†ïÏóêÏÑú ÏûÖÎ†•ÌïòÎ©¥ PDF¬∑Î≥µÏÇ¨Î¨∏Ïóê ÏûêÎèô Î∞òÏòÅ)

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ko">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
<title>Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞</title>
<style>
  :root { --bg:#f8fafc; --card:#fff; --border:#e5e7eb; --text:#111827; --muted:#6b7280; --primary:#111827; }
  *{ box-sizing:border-box; }
  body{ margin:0; font-family:system-ui,-apple-system,Segoe UI,Roboto,Apple SD Gothic Neo,Noto Sans KR,sans-serif; background:var(--bg); color:var(--text); }
  .container{ max-width:960px; margin:0 auto; padding:24px; }
  h1{ font-size:24px; font-weight:800; text-align:center; margin:0 0 8px; }
  p.lead{ text-align:center; color:var(--muted); font-size:13px; margin:0 0 24px; }
  .grid{ display:grid; grid-template-columns:1fr; gap:16px; }
  @media(min-width:900px){ .grid{ grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr; } }
  .card{ background:var(--card); border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:16px; padding:16px; box-shadow:0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.03); }
  .title{ font-weight:700; margin-bottom:12px; }
  .row{ display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:space-between; gap:12px; border-bottom:1px solid var(--border); padding:8px 0; }
  .row:last-child{ border-bottom:none; }
  .muted{ color:var(--muted); font-size:12px; }
  .input{ width:140px; padding:8px 10px; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:10px; font-size:14px; }
  .btn{ border:1px solid var(--border); background:#fff; padding:8px 12px; border-radius:10px; font-size:13px; cursor:pointer; }
  .btn.primary{ background:var(--primary); color:#fff; border-color:var(--primary); }
  .chip{ border:1px solid var(--border); padding:6px 10px; border-radius:999px; font-size:12px; cursor:pointer; background:#fff; }
  .chip.active{ background:#111827; color:#fff; border-color:#111827; }
  .grid-items{ display:grid; grid-template-columns:1fr; gap:8px; }
  @media(min-width:520px){ .grid-items{ grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr; } }
  .item{ display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:space-between; gap:10px; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:12px; padding:10px 12px; }
  .pill{ background:#f3f4f6; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:12px; padding:12px; text-align:center; }
  .flex{ display:flex; gap:8px; flex-wrap:wrap; }
</style>
</head>
<body>
  <div class="container" id="app">
    <h1>Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞</h1>
    <p class="lead">ÏßÄÏûêÏ≤¥ ÎåÄÌòïÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º Ïã†Í≥†/Ïä§Ìã∞Ïª§Îäî Í≥†Í∞ù Ïã§ÎπÑ Î∂ÄÎã¥Ïù¥Î©∞, Î≥∏ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞Îäî ÏàòÍ±∞¬∑Ïö¥Î∞ò ÎåÄÌñâ ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ ÏöîÍ∏à ÏòàÏãúÏûÖÎãàÎã§.</p>

    <div class="grid">
      <section class="card">
        <div class="title">Í≥†Í∞ù ÏûÖÎ†•</div>
        <div class="row">
          <div>
            <div>Í±∞Î¶¨ (ÏôïÎ≥µ km)</div>
            <div class="muted">Í∏∞Î≥∏ <span id="cfgBaseKmLabel"></span>km Ìè¨Ìï®, Ï¥àÍ≥º kmÎãπ <span id="cfgPerKmLabel"></span>Ïõê</div>
          </div>
          <input class="input" type="number" id="distanceKm" value="8" />
        </div>

        <div class="row"><div>Ï∏µÏàò</div><input class="input" type="number" id="floors" value="1" /></div>

        <div class="row">
          <div>ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞</div>
          <div class="flex">
            <button class="chip active" id="elevYes">ÏûàÏùå</button>
            <button class="chip" id="elevNo">ÏóÜÏùå</button>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div class="row"><div>Î≥¥Ï°∞ Ïù∏Î†•</div><input class="input" type="number" id="helpers" value="0" /></div>

        <div class="row">
          <div>Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ</div>
          <div class="flex">
            <button class="chip" id="wkNo">ÎØ∏Ï†ÅÏö©</button>
            <button class="chip active" id="wkYes">Ï†ÅÏö©</button>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div style="margin:12px 0 6px; font-weight:600">ÌíàÎ™© ÏàòÎüâ</div>
        <div class="grid-items" id="itemsList"></div>
      </section>

      <section class="card">
        <div class="title">ÏòàÏÉÅ ÏöîÍ∏à</div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">Í∏∞Î≥∏ÏöîÍ∏à</div><div id="vBase">-</div></div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">ÌíàÎ™© Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÌï©</div><div id="vItems">-</div></div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">Í±∞Î¶¨ Ï∂îÍ∞Ä</div><div id="vDist">-</div></div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">Ï∏µÏàò Ï∂îÍ∞Ä(Î¨¥ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞)</div><div id="vFloor">-</div></div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">Î≥¥Ï°∞ Ïù∏Î†•</div><div id="vHelper">-</div></div>
        <div class="row"><div class="muted">Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ Í∞ÄÏ§ëÏπò</div><div id="vMul">√ó 1.00</div></div>

        <div class="pill" style="margin:14px 0">
          <div class="muted">Í≥†Í∞ù Í≤∞Ï†ú ÏòàÏÉÅ</div>
          <div style="font-weight:800; font-size:22px" id="vTotal">-</div>
        </div>

        <div class="flex">
          <button class="btn" id="btnCopy">Í≤¨Ï†Å ÎÇ¥Ïö© Î≥µÏÇ¨</button>
          <button class="btn primary" id="btnPDF">PDF Í≤¨Ï†ÅÏÑú Îã§Ïö¥Î°úÎìú</button>
          <button class="btn" id="btnShare">Í≥µÏú†</button>
        </div>
        <div class="muted" style="margin-top:8px">‚Äª ÏßÄÏûêÏ≤¥ ÎåÄÌòïÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º Ïä§Ìã∞Ïª§ ÎπÑÏö©ÏùÄ Î≥ÑÎèÑ(Ïã§ÎπÑ)ÏûÖÎãàÎã§.</div>
      </section>
    </div>

    <details class="card" style="margin-top:18px" open>
      <summary class="title" style="cursor:pointer">Ïö¥ÏòÅÏûê ÏÑ§Ï†ï</summary>
      <div class="grid" style="grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr">
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">ÏÉÅÌò∏/Î∏åÎûúÎìú</span><input class="input" id="bizName" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Ïó∞ÎùΩÏ≤ò</span><input class="input" id="bizPhone" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Ïù¥Î©îÏùº</span><input class="input" id="bizEmail" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Í∏∞Î≥∏ÏöîÍ∏à</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgBaseFee" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Í∏∞Î≥∏Í±∞Î¶¨(km)</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgBaseKm" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Ï¥àÍ≥º kmÎãπ</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgPerKm" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Î¨¥ÏóòÎ≤† Ï∏µÎãπ</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgNoElev" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ Í∞ÄÏÇ∞Ïú®(Ïòà:0.2)</span><input class="input" type="number" step="0.01" id="cfgWeekend" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Î≥¥Ï°∞ 1Ïù∏ ÎπÑÏö©</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgHelper" /></label>
      </div>

      <div style="margin-top:12px; font-weight:700">ÌíàÎ™© Îã®Í∞Ä</div>
      <div id="adminItems"></div>
      <div class="flex" style="margin-top:8px">
        <button class="btn" id="addItem">+ ÌíàÎ™© Ï∂îÍ∞Ä</button>
        <button class="btn" id="applyItems">Îã®Í∞Ä Ï†ÅÏö©</button>
      </div>

      <div class="flex" style="margin-top:12px">
        <button class="btn" id="btnExport">ÏÑ§Ï†ï ÎÇ¥Î≥¥ÎÇ¥Í∏∞</button>
        <button class="btn" id="btnImport">ÏÑ§Ï†ï Î∂àÎü¨Ïò§Í∏∞</button>
        <button class="btn" id="btnReset">Í∏∞Î≥∏Í∞í Î≥µÏõê</button>
      </div>
    </details>
  </div>

  <!-- jsPDF CDN -->
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jspdf@2.5.1/dist/jspdf.umd.min.js"></script>

  <script>
    const KR = n => (Number(n)||0).toLocaleString('ko-KR');
    const $ = sel => document.querySelector(sel);
    const el = (tag, attrs={}, children=[]) => {
      const d=document.createElement(tag);
      Object.entries(attrs).forEach(([k,v])=>{
        if(k==='class') d.className=v; else if(k==='text') d.textContent=v;
        else if(k==='value') d.value=v; else d.setAttribute(k,v);
      });
      children.forEach(c=>d.appendChild(c)); return d;
    };

    const DEF = {
      bizName:'', bizPhone:'', bizEmail:'',
      baseFee:120000, baseDistanceKm:10, extraPerKm:1000,
      noElevPerFloor:5000, weekendRate:0.2, helperFee:50000,
      items:[
        {id:'fridge',label:'ÎÉâÏû•Í≥†(Ï§ë/ÎåÄ)',price:20000,unitLabel:'ÎåÄ'},
        {id:'washer',label:'ÏÑ∏ÌÉÅÍ∏∞',price:15000,unitLabel:'ÎåÄ'},
        {id:'drum',label:'ÎìúÎüº ÏÑ∏ÌÉÅÍ∏∞',price:20000,unitLabel:'ÎåÄ'},
        {id:'bed_s',label:'Ïπ®ÎåÄ(Ïã±Í∏Ä/ÎçîÎ∏î)',price:10000,unitLabel:'ÏÑ∏Ìä∏'},
        {id:'bed_l',label:'Ïπ®ÎåÄ(ÎåÄÌòï)',price:20000,unitLabel:'ÏÑ∏Ìä∏'},
        {id:'wardrobe',label:'Ïû•Î°±(2~3Ïπ∏)',price:30000,unitLabel:'Í∞ú'},
        {id:'desk',label:'Ï±ÖÏÉÅ/Ï±ÖÏû•',price:10000,unitLabel:'Í∞ú'},
        {id:'small',label:'ÏÜåÌòïÍ∞ÄÍµ¨',price:5000,unitLabel:'Í∞ú'},
      ]
    };
    const LSKEY='haul_embed_cfg_v1';

    let CFG=loadCfg();
    let STATE={distanceKm:8,floors:1,hasElevator:true,helpers:0,weekend:true,items:Object.fromEntries((CFG.items||[]).map(i=>[i.id,0]))};

    function loadCfg(){ try{const raw=localStorage.getItem(LSKEY); if(raw) return JSON.parse(raw);}catch{} return JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(DEF)); }
    function saveCfg(){ try{localStorage.setItem(LSKEY,JSON.stringify(CFG));}catch{} }

    function itemsSum(){ return (CFG.items||[]).reduce((s,i)=>s+(Number(STATE.items[i.id]||0)*(Number(i.price)||0)),0); }
    function calc(){
      const base=+CFG.baseFee||0;
      const distExtra=Math.max(0,(+STATE.distanceKm||0)-(+CFG.baseDistanceKm||0))*(+CFG.extraPerKm||0);
      const floorExtra=STATE.hasElevator?0:Math.max(0,+STATE.floors||0)*(+CFG.noElevPerFloor||0);
      const helperExtra=(+STATE.helpers||0)*(+CFG.helperFee||0);
      const subtotal=base+itemsSum()+distExtra+floorExtra+helperExtra;
      const weekendMul=STATE.weekend?(1+(+CFG.weekendRate||0)):1;
      const total=Math.round(subtotal*weekendMul);

      $('#vBase').textContent=KR(base)+'Ïõê';
      $('#vItems').textContent=KR(itemsSum())+'Ïõê';
      $('#vDist').textContent=KR(distExtra)+'Ïõê';
      $('#vFloor').textContent=KR(floorExtra)+'Ïõê';
      $('#vHelper').textContent=KR(helperExtra)+'Ïõê';
      $('#vMul').textContent='√ó '+weekendMul.toFixed(2);
      $('#vTotal').textContent=KR(total)+'Ïõê';
    }
    function refreshLabels(){ $('#cfgBaseKmLabel').textContent=CFG.baseDistanceKm; $('#cfgPerKmLabel').textContent=KR(CFG.extraPerKm); }

    function bindItems(){
      const wrap=$('#itemsList'); wrap.innerHTML='';
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach(it=>{
        const qty=+STATE.items[it.id]||0;
        const row=el('div',{class:'item'},[
          el('div',{},[
            el('div',{text:it.label,class:'title',style:'font-weight:600;font-size:14px'}),
            el('div',{text:(it.unitLabel||'Í∞ú')+'Îãπ '+KR(it.price)+'Ïõê',class:'muted'})
          ]),
          el('div',{},[ el('input',{class:'input',type:'number',value:qty,id:'qty_'+it.id}) ])
        ]);
        wrap.appendChild(row);
        row.querySelector('input').addEventListener('input',e=>{ STATE.items[it.id]=+(e.target.value||0); calc(); });
      });
    }

    function bindAdmin(){
      $('#bizName').value=CFG.bizName||''; $('#bizPhone').value=CFG.bizPhone||''; $('#bizEmail').value=CFG.bizEmail||'';
      $('#cfgBaseFee').value=CFG.baseFee; $('#cfgBaseKm').value=CFG.baseDistanceKm; $('#cfgPerKm').value=CFG.extraPerKm;
      $('#cfgNoElev').value=CFG.noElevPerFloor; $('#cfgWeekend').value=CFG.weekendRate; $('#cfgHelper').value=CFG.helperFee;
      refreshLabels();

      const adminWrap=$('#adminItems'); adminWrap.innerHTML='';
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach((it,idx)=>{
        const row=el('div',{class:'row'},[
          el('input',{class:'input',value:it.label}),
          el('input',{class:'input',value:it.unitLabel||'Í∞ú'}),
          el('input',{class:'input',type:'number',value:it.price}),
          el('button',{class:'btn',text:'ÏÇ≠Ï†ú'})
        ]);
        const [iLabel,iUnit,iPrice,btnDel]=row.querySelectorAll('input,button');
        iLabel.addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.items[idx].label=e.target.value;saveCfg();bindItems();});
        iUnit.addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.items[idx].unitLabel=e.target.value;saveCfg();bindItems();});
        iPrice.addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.items[idx].price=+(e.target.value||0);saveCfg();calc();bindItems();});
        btnDel.addEventListener('click',()=>{CFG.items.splice(idx,1);saveCfg();bindAdmin();bindItems();calc();});
        adminWrap.appendChild(row);
      });
    }

    $('#bizName').addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.bizName=e.target.value;saveCfg();});
    $('#bizPhone').addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.bizPhone=e.target.value;saveCfg();});
    $('#bizEmail').addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.bizEmail=e.target.value;saveCfg();});
    $('#cfgBaseFee').addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.baseFee=+(e.target.value||0);saveCfg();calc();});
    $('#cfgBaseKm').addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.baseDistanceKm=+(e.target.value||0);saveCfg();refreshLabels();calc();});
    $('#cfgPerKm').addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.extraPerKm=+(e.target.value||0);saveCfg();refreshLabels();calc();});
    $('#cfgNoElev').addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.noElevPerFloor=+(e.target.value||0);saveCfg();calc();});
    $('#cfgWeekend').addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.weekendRate=+(e.target.value||0);saveCfg();calc();});
    $('#cfgHelper').addEventListener('input',e=>{CFG.helperFee=+(e.target.value||0);saveCfg();calc();});

    document.getElementById('addItem').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      const id='itm_'+Math.random().toString(36).slice(2,8);
      CFG.items.push({id,label:'ÏÉà ÌíàÎ™©',price:0,unitLabel:'Í∞ú'}); const item=CFG.items[CFG.items.length-1]; item.id=id;
      saveCfg(); STATE.items[id]=0; bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc();
    });
    document.getElementById('applyItems').addEventListener('click',()=>{saveCfg();bindItems();calc();});
    document.getElementById('btnExport').addEventListener('click',async()=>{
      const text=JSON.stringify(CFG,null,2);
      try{await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);alert('ÏÑ§Ï†ïÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶ΩÎ≥¥ÎìúÏóê Î≥µÏÇ¨ÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.');}catch{alert(text);}
    });
    document.getElementById('btnImport').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      const text=prompt('Î∂ôÏó¨ÎÑ£Í∏∞ Ìï† ÏÑ§Ï†ï JSONÏùÑ ÏûÖÎ†•ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî:'); if(!text) return;
      try{CFG=JSON.parse(text);saveCfg();bindAdmin();bindItems();calc();}catch{alert('JSON ÌååÏã± Ïã§Ìå®');}
    });
    document.getElementById('btnReset').addEventListener('click',()=>{CFG=JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(DEF));saveCfg();bindAdmin();bindItems();calc();});

    $('#distanceKm').addEventListener('input',e=>{STATE.distanceKm=+(e.target.value||0);calc();});
    $('#floors').addEventListener('input',e=>{STATE.floors=+(e.target.value||0);calc();});
    $('#helpers').addEventListener('input',e=>{STATE.helpers=+(e.target.value||0);calc();});

    function setElev(has){ STATE.hasElevator=has; $('#elevYes').classList.toggle('active',has); $('#elevNo').classList.toggle('active',!has); calc(); }
    document.getElementById('elevYes').addEventListener('click',()=>setElev(true));
    document.getElementById('elevNo').addEventListener('click',()=>setElev(false));

    function setWeekend(on){ STATE.weekend=on; $('#wkYes').classList.toggle('active',on); $('#wkNo').classList.toggle('active',!on); calc(); }
    document.getElementById('wkYes').addEventListener('click',()=>setWeekend(true));
    document.getElementById('wkNo').addEventListener('click',()=>setWeekend(false));

    function buildQuoteText(){
      const date=new Date().toLocaleString();
      const itemsStr=(CFG.items||[]).map(i=>`${i.label} ${STATE.items[i.id]||0}${i.unitLabel||'Í∞ú'}`).filter(s=>!/ 0$/.test(s)).join('\n');
      const base=+CFG.baseFee||0;
      const distExtra=Math.max(0,(+STATE.distanceKm||0)-(+CFG.baseDistanceKm||0))*(+CFG.extraPerKm||0);
      const floorExtra=STATE.hasElevator?0:Math.max(0,+STATE.floors||0)*(+CFG.noElevPerFloor||0);
      const helperExtra=(+STATE.helpers||0)*(+CFG.helperFee||0);
      const subtotal=base+itemsSum()+distExtra+floorExtra+helperExtra;
      const weekendMul=STATE.weekend?(1+(+CFG.weekendRate||0)):1;
      const total=Math.round(subtotal*weekendMul);
      return [
        `[Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≤¨Ï†Å]`,
        `ÏùºÏãú: ${date}`,
        CFG.bizName?`ÏóÖÏ≤¥: ${CFG.bizName}`:null,
        CFG.bizPhone?`Ïó∞ÎùΩÏ≤ò: ${CFG.bizPhone}`:null,
        CFG.bizEmail?`Ïù¥Î©îÏùº: ${CFG.bizEmail}`:null,
        ``,
        `Í±∞Î¶¨(ÏôïÎ≥µ): ${STATE.distanceKm}km`,
        `Ï∏µÏàò: ${STATE.floors}Ï∏µ / ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ${STATE.hasElevator?'ÏûàÏùå':'ÏóÜÏùå'}`,
        `Î≥¥Ï°∞ Ïù∏Î†•: ${STATE.helpers}Î™Ö`,
        `Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ: ${STATE.weekend?'Ï†ÅÏö©':'ÎØ∏Ï†ÅÏö©'}`,
        ``,
        itemsStr?`ÌíàÎ™©:\n${itemsStr}`:`ÌíàÎ™©: ÏóÜÏùå`,
        ``,
        `ÏòàÏÉÅ Í≤∞Ï†ú Í∏àÏï°: ${KR(total)}Ïõê`,
        `(ÎåÄÌñâ ÏàòÏàòÎ£å Ìè¨Ìï® / ÎåÄÌòïÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º Ïä§Ìã∞Ïª§ ÎπÑÏö© Î≥ÑÎèÑ)`
      ].filter(Boolean).join('\n');
    }

    document.getElementById('btnCopy').addEventListener('click',async()=>{
      const text=buildQuoteText();
      try{await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);alert('Í≤¨Ï†Å ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶ΩÎ≥¥ÎìúÏóê Î≥µÏÇ¨ÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.');}catch{alert(text);}
    });

    document.getElementById('btnShare').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      const text=buildQuoteText();
      if(navigator.share){ navigator.share({title:'Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≤¨Ï†Å',text}); }
      else{ alert('Ïù¥ Î∏åÎùºÏö∞Ï†ÄÎäî Í≥µÏú† Í∏∞Îä•ÏùÑ ÏßÄÏõêÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÏäµÎãàÎã§. Î≥µÏÇ¨ Í∏∞Îä•ÏùÑ Ïù¥Ïö©ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.'); }
    });

    document.getElementById('btnPDF').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      const {jsPDF}=window.jspdf; const doc=new jsPDF(); const left=14; let y=20;
      doc.setFontSize(16); doc.text('Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≤¨Ï†ÅÏÑú', left, y); y+=8;
      doc.setFontSize(11);
      const bizLine=[CFG.bizName,CFG.bizPhone,CFG.bizEmail].filter(Boolean).join('  ‚Ä¢  ');
      if(bizLine){ doc.text(bizLine,left,y); y+=8; }
      doc.text(`ÏûëÏÑ±ÏùºÏãú: ${new Date().toLocaleString()}`,left,y); y+=10;

      [['Í±∞Î¶¨(ÏôïÎ≥µ)',`${STATE.distanceKm} km`],
       ['Ï∏µÏàò/ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞',`${STATE.floors}Ï∏µ / ${STATE.hasElevator?'ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏûàÏùå':'ÏóÜÏùå'}`],
       ['Î≥¥Ï°∞ Ïù∏Î†•',`${STATE.helpers} Î™Ö`],
       ['Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ',STATE.weekend?'Ï†ÅÏö©':'ÎØ∏Ï†ÅÏö©']]
       .forEach(r=>{ doc.text(`${r[0]}: ${r[1]}`,left,y); y+=7; });

      y+=3; doc.setFont(undefined,'bold'); doc.text('ÌíàÎ™©',left,y); doc.setFont(undefined,'normal'); y+=7;
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach(i=>{ const q=+STATE.items[i.id]||0; if(q>0){ doc.text(`- ${i.label}: ${q}${i.unitLabel||'Í∞ú'}`,left,y); y+=6; } });

      const base=+CFG.baseFee||0, distExtra=Math.max(0,(+STATE.distanceKm||0)-(+CFG.baseDistanceKm||0))*(+CFG.extraPerKm||0);
      const floorExtra=STATE.hasElevator?0:Math.max(0,+STATE.floors||0)*(+CFG.noElevPerFloor||0);
      const helperExtra=(+STATE.helpers||0)*(+CFG.helperFee||0);
      const subtotal=base+itemsSum()+distExtra+floorExtra+helperExtra;
      const weekendMul=STATE.weekend?(1+(+CFG.weekendRate||0)):1;
      const total=Math.round(subtotal*weekendMul);

      y+=4; doc.setFont(undefined,'bold'); doc.text(`ÏòàÏÉÅ Í≤∞Ï†ú Í∏àÏï°: ${KR(total)}Ïõê`,left,y); doc.setFont(undefined,'normal'); y+=8;
      doc.setFontSize(10); doc.text('‚Äª ÎåÄÌòïÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º Ïä§Ìã∞Ïª§ ÎπÑÏö©ÏùÄ Î≥ÑÎèÑ(Ïã§ÎπÑ)Ïù¥Î©∞, Î≥∏ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞Îäî ÎÇ¥Î¶º/ÏàòÍ±∞ ÎåÄÌñâ ÏòàÏÉÅÍ∞ÄÏûÖÎãàÎã§.', left, y);
      doc.save('Í≤¨Ï†ÅÏÑú.pdf');
    });

    // Ï¥àÍ∏∞ ÏÖãÏóÖ
    function postHeight(){ try{ var h=document.documentElement.scrollHeight; parent.postMessage({type:'CALC_RESIZE',height:h},'*'); }catch(e){} }
    function init(){ bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc(); postHeight(); }
    window.addEventListener('load', init); window.addEventListener('resize', postHeight); setTimeout(postHeight, 300);

    // Í∞ÑÎã® ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏(ÏΩòÏÜî)
    (function(){
      try{
        const id0=CFG.items[0].id; STATE.items[id0]=2;
        const t=buildQuoteText();
        console.assert(t.includes('ÏòàÏÉÅ Í≤∞Ï†ú Í∏àÏï°'), 'Í∏àÏï° Ï§Ñ ÎàÑÎùΩ');
        console.assert(t.includes('2'), 'ÌíàÎ™© ÏàòÎüâ Î∞òÏòÅ Ïã§Ìå®');
      }catch(e){ console.warn('Dev test Ïã§Ìå®', e); }
    })();
  </script>
</body>
</html>

Ìä∏Îü¨Î∏îÏäàÌåÖ

  • ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÍ∞Ä Ïïà Î∞îÎÄåÎ©¥ https://jsh0333.github.io/bulky/?v=2 Ï≤òÎüº ?v=Ïà´ÏûêÎ•º Î∂ôÏó¨ Ïó¥Ïñ¥Î≥¥ÏÑ∏Ïöî(Ï∫êÏãú Î¨¥Î†•Ìôî).

  • -2/ Í≤ΩÎ°úÎ•º Í≥ÑÏÜç Ïì∞Í≥† Ïã∂ÏúºÎ©¥, Í∞ôÏùÄ index.htmlÏùÑ -2/index.htmlÏóêÎèÑ Î≥µÏÇ¨Ìï¥ ÎëêÎ©¥ Îê©ÎãàÎã§.

ÌïÑÏöîÌïòÏãúÎ©¥ ÏÉÅÌò∏/Ï†ÑÌôî/Ïù¥Î©îÏùº Í∏∞Î≥∏Í∞íÏùÑ ÏÜåÏä§Ïóê ÎØ∏Î¶¨ ÎÑ£Ïñ¥ ÎìúÎ¶¨Í±∞ÎÇò, ÌíàÎ™© Í∏∞Î≥∏ÌëúÎ•º Í∑ÄÌïò Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÌëúÎ°ú ÏÑ∏ÌåÖÌï¥ ÎìúÎ¶¥Í≤åÏöî.
ÏõêÌïòÏãúÎäî Í∏∞Î≥∏Í∞í(ÏÉÅÌò∏/Ïó∞ÎùΩÏ≤ò/Ïù¥Î©îÏùº/Îã®Í∞Ä)ÏùÑ ÏïåÎ†§Ï£ºÏã§ÍπåÏöî?

üîé ÏâΩÍ≤å ÏòàÏãú Îì§Ïñ¥ ÎìúÎ¶¨Î©¥

  • Ïú†ÌäúÎ∏å ÏòÅÏÉÅÏùÑ Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ Í∏Ä ÏïàÏóê ÎÑ£ÏùÑ Îïå, Ï£ºÏÜåÎßå Ïì∞Îäî Í≤å ÏïÑÎãàÎùº ÏòÅÏÉÅÏù¥ Î∞îÎ°ú Ïû¨ÏÉùÎêòÍ≤å ÎÇòÏò§ÏûñÏïÑÏöî?
    ‚Üí Í∑∏Í≤å ‚ÄúÏú†ÌäúÎ∏å ÌîåÎ†àÏù¥Ïñ¥Î•º Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Ïóê ÏûÑÎ≤†Îìú(embed) Ìïú Í≤É‚ÄùÏù¥ÏóêÏöî.

  • Í∞ôÏùÄ Î∞©ÏãùÏúºÎ°ú, Ï†úÍ∞Ä ÎßåÎì§Ïñ¥ÎìúÎ¶∞ ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞ ÌîÑÎ°úÍ∑∏Îû®ÏùÑ

üìå ÏûÑÎ≤†Îìú Î∞©Ïãù

Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ HTML Ìé∏ÏßëÏóêÏÑú Ïù¥Îü∞ ÏΩîÎìúÎ•º Î∂ôÏó¨ ÎÑ£Îäî Í±∏ ÎßêÌï©ÎãàÎã§:

  • <iframe> Ïù¥ÎùºÎäî ÌãÄ ÏïàÏóê, Ï†úÍ∞Ä ÎßåÎì† Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞ Ï£ºÏÜåÎ•º Î∂àÎü¨ÏòµÎãàÎã§.

  • Í∑∏ÎûòÏÑú Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ Î∞©Î¨∏ÏûêÍ∞Ä Í∏ÄÏùÑ ÏùΩÏúºÎ©¥ÏÑú Î∞îÎ°ú Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞Î•º Ïù¥Ïö©Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÍ≤å Îê©ÎãàÎã§.
    (Íµ≥Ïù¥ ‚ÄúÎã§Î•∏ ÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ìä∏Î°ú Ïù¥Îèô‚ÄùÌï† ÌïÑÏöî ÏóÜÏù¥ Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ ÏïàÏóêÏÑú Ïã§ÌñâÎê®)

üëâ Ï¶â, ‚ÄúÏûÑÎ≤†Îìú‚ÄùÎäî ÎÇ¥ Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Ïóê Îã§Î•∏ ÏõπÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ìä∏Î•º ÏÇΩÏûÖÌï¥ÏÑú Î≥¥Ïó¨Ï£ºÎäî Í≤ÉÏùÑ ÎßêÌï¥Ïöî.

ÌòπÏãú ÏõêÌïòÏãúÎäî Í≤å

  • Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ ÏïàÏóêÏÑú Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞Í∞Ä Î∞îÎ°ú Ïã§ÌñâÎêòÎèÑÎ°ù(ÏûÑÎ≤†Îìú) ÌïòÍ≥† Ïã∂ÏúºÏã† Í±¥ÏßÄ,

  • ÏïÑÎãàÎ©¥ ‚ÄúÍ≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞ Ïó¥Í∏∞‚Äù ÎßÅÌÅ¨Îßå Í±∏Ïñ¥ÎëêÍ≥† ÏÉàÏ∞ΩÏóêÏÑú Ïó¥Î¶¨Í≤å ÌïòÍ≥† Ïã∂ÏúºÏã† Í±¥ÏßÄ
    ÌôïÏù∏Ìï¥ Ï£ºÏã§ Ïàò ÏûàÏùÑÍπåÏöî?

ÎÇòÏùò Îßê:
ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞ ÌîÑÎ°úÍ∑∏Îû® Îã§Ïãú Ïò¨Î†§Ï§ò ÏóÖÎ°úÎìúÍ∞Ä ÏïàÎêòÏóàÎÑ§
ChatGPTÏùò Îßê:

Îã§Ïãú Ï§ÄÎπÑÌï¥ÎìúÎ†∏Ïñ¥Ïöî! üôå
ÏïÑÎûò ÏôÑÏÑ± HTML ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Î∞õÏïÑÏÑú ÍπÉÌóàÎ∏å/Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Ïóê Ïò¨Î¶¨Î©¥ Î∞îÎ°ú Ïã§ÌñâÎê©ÎãàÎã§.

bulky_waste_drop_calculator.html Îã§Ïö¥Î°úÎìú

ÍπÉÌóàÎ∏å ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÏóê ÏóÖÎ°úÎìú(Ï∂îÏ≤ú)

  1. Ï†ÄÏû•ÏÜå Ïó¥Í∏∞: jsh0333/jsh0333.github.io

  2. Add file ‚Üí Upload files

  3. Ìè¥Îçî bulky/ Î•º ÎßåÎì§Í≥†, ÏúÑ ÌååÏùºÏùÑ index.html Î°ú ÏóÖÎ°úÎìú

    • Í≤∞Í≥º Í≤ΩÎ°ú: bulky/index.html

  4. Commit ÌõÑ Ï†ëÏÜç ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏:

    • https://jsh0333.github.io/bulky/?v=1 (Ï∫êÏãú Î¨¥Î†•ÌôîÏö© ?v=1 Î∂ôÏù¥Í∏∞)

Í∏∞Ï°¥ -2/ Î•º Ïì∞Í≥† Ïã∂ÏúºÎ©¥ -2/index.html Î°ú ÏóÖÎ°úÎìúÌï¥ÎèÑ Îê©ÎãàÎã§.

Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏Ïóê ÏûÑÎ≤†Îìú(Í∏Ä ÏïàÏóêÏÑú Î∞îÎ°ú Ïã§Ìñâ)

Î∏îÎ°úÍ∑∏ HTML/ÏÜåÏä§ Ìé∏ÏßëÏóêÏÑú ÏïÑÎûò ÏΩîÎìú Î∂ôÏó¨ÎÑ£Í∏∞:

html
<!-- Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞ -->
<div style="max-width:980px;margin:0 auto">
  <iframe
    src="https://jsh0333.github.io/bulky/"
    title="Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞"
    style="width:100%;height:1600px;border:0;border-radius:12px;overflow:hidden"
    loading="lazy"
    referrerpolicy="no-referrer"
  ></iframe>
  <div style="text-align:center;margin-top:10px">
    <a href="https://jsh0333.github.io/bulky/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"
       style="display:inline-block;padding:10px 14px;border-radius:10px;border:1px solid #e5e7eb;text-decoration:none;color:#111827">
      ÏÉà Ï∞ΩÏóêÏÑú Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Í∏∞ Ïó¥Í∏∞
    </a>
  </div>
</div>

(ÏÑ†ÌÉù) ÏûêÎèô ÎÜíÏù¥ Ï°∞Ï†à Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î¶ΩÌä∏(ÌîåÎû´ÌèºÏù¥ <script> ÌóàÏö© Ïãú):

html
<script>
  window.addEventListener('message',function(e){
    if(!e.data||e.data.type!=='CALC_RESIZE') return;
    var ifr=document.querySelector('iframe[src*="/bulky/"]');
    if(ifr) ifr.style.height=(e.data.height||1600)+'px';
  });
</script>

Ïö¥ÏòÅÏûê ÏÑ§Ï†ï(ÌôîÎ©¥ ÌïòÎã® ‚ÄúÏö¥ÏòÅÏûê ÏÑ§Ï†ï‚Äù)

  • Í∏∞Î≥∏ÏöîÍ∏à/Í∏∞Î≥∏Í±∞Î¶¨/kmÎãπ/Ï∏µÎãπ/Ï£ºÎßêÍ∞ÄÏÇ∞/Î≥¥Ï°∞ÎπÑ: Í∏∞Î≥∏Í∞íÏùÄ Ï†ÑÎ∂Ä 0(ÏöîÏ≤≠ Î∞òÏòÅ). ÏõêÌïòÏãúÎäî Í∞íÏúºÎ°ú ÏûÖÎ†•ÌïòÎ©¥ ÏûêÎèô Ï†ÄÏû•(localStorage).

  • ÌíàÎ™© Îã®Í∞Ä: Í∏∞Î≥∏ÏúºÎ°ú 4Í∞ú Îπà ÌíàÎ™©Ïù¥ Ï§ÄÎπÑÎêòÏñ¥ ÏûàÏñ¥ Ïù¥Î¶Ñ/Îã®ÏúÑ/Îã®Í∞ÄÎ•º ÏßÅÏ†ë ÏûÖÎ†•Ìï¥ÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. (Ï∂îÍ∞Ä/ÏÇ≠Ï†ú Í∞ÄÎä•)

  • ÎÇ¥Î≥¥ÎÇ¥Í∏∞/Î∂àÎü¨Ïò§Í∏∞/Í∏∞Î≥∏Í∞í Î≥µÏõê Î≤ÑÌäº Ï†úÍ≥µ.

Í≥µÏú†/Î≥µÏÇ¨/PDF

  • Í≤¨Ï†Å ÎÇ¥Ïö© Î≥µÏÇ¨: Î©îÏã†Ï†ÄÏóê Î∂ôÏó¨ÎÑ£Í∏∞ Ïö©

  • Í≥µÏú†: Î™®Î∞îÏùº Web Share API ÏßÄÏõê Î∏åÎùºÏö∞Ï†ÄÏóêÏÑú Í≥µÏú† ÏãúÌä∏ Ïó¥Î¶º

  • PDF: jsPDFÎ°ú Í≤¨Ï†ÅÏÑú PDF Ï†ÄÏû•

Î¨∏Ï†úÍ∞Ä ÏÉùÍ∏∞Î©¥

  • https://jsh0333.github.io/bulky/?v=2 Ï≤òÎüº ?v= Ïà´ÏûêÎ•º Î∞îÍøî ÏÉàÎ°ú Ïó¥Ïñ¥ Î≥¥ÏÑ∏Ïöî(Ï∫êÏãú Î¨¥Î†•Ìôî).

  • GitHub Pages ÏÜåÏä§Í∞Ä main Î£®Ìä∏Ïù∏ÏßÄ(Settings ‚Üí Pages) ÌôïÏù∏.

  • Ìè¥Îçî Í≤ΩÎ°ú Î∞è ÌååÏùºÎ™ÖÏù¥ Ï†ïÌôïÌûà bulky/index.html Ïù∏ÏßÄ ÌôïÏù∏.

ÏõêÌïòÏãúÎ©¥ ÏÉÅÌò∏/Ï†ÑÌôî/Ïù¥Î©îÏùºÏùÑ Í∏∞Î≥∏Í∞íÏúºÎ°ú Î∞ïÏïÑÎëî Î≤ÑÏ†ÑÏù¥ÎÇò, ÌíàÎ™©/Îã®Í∞Ä Í∏∞Î≥∏ÌëúÎ•º ÎÑ£Ïñ¥ ÎìúÎ¶¥ Ïàò ÏûàÏñ¥Ïöî.
Í∏∞Î≥∏ÏúºÎ°ú ÎÑ£ÏùÑ Í∞í(ÏÉÅÌò∏/Ïó∞ÎùΩÏ≤ò/Ïù¥Î©îÏùº/Îã®Í∞ÄÌëú) ÏïåÎ†§Ï£ºÏãúÎ©¥ Ï¶âÏãú Î∞òÏòÅÌï¥ÏÑú ÌååÏùº ÎßåÎì§Ïñ¥ ÎìúÎ¶¥Í≤åÏöî!

ÎÇòÏùò Îßê:

Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î¶∞ÏÉ∑ Î≥¥Îãà -2 Ìè¥Îçî ÏïàÏóê index.htmlÏù¥ ÏóÜÏäµÎãàÎã§.

ÏïÑÎûò Îëò Ï§ë ÌïòÎÇòÎ°ú Î∞îÎ°ú Ìï¥Í≤∞ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.

Î∞©Î≤ï 1) index.htmlÎ°ú Î∞îÍæ∏Í∏∞(Í∂åÏû•)

        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Í∏∞Î≥∏ÏöîÍ∏à</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgBaseFee" value="0" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Í∏∞Î≥∏Í±∞Î¶¨(km)</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgBaseKm" value="0" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Ï¥àÍ≥º kmÎãπ</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgPerKm" value="0" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Î¨¥ÏóòÎ≤† Ï∏µÎãπ</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgNoElev" value="0" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ Í∞ÄÏÇ∞Ïú®(Ïòà:0.2)</span><input class="input" type="number" step="0.01" id="cfgWeekend" value="0" /></label>
        <label class="row"><span class="muted">Î≥¥Ï°∞ 1Ïù∏ ÎπÑÏö©</span><input class="input" type="number" id="cfgHelper" value="0" /></label>
      </div>

      <div style="margin-top:12px; font-weight:700">ÌíàÎ™© Îã®Í∞Ä</div>
      <div id="adminItems"></div>
      <div class="flex" style="margin-top:8px">
        <button class="btn" id="addItem">+ ÌíàÎ™© Ï∂îÍ∞Ä</button>
        <button class="btn" id="applyItems">Îã®Í∞Ä Ï†ÅÏö©</button>
      </div>

      <div class="flex" style="margin-top:12px">
        <button class="btn" id="btnExport">ÏÑ§Ï†ï ÎÇ¥Î≥¥ÎÇ¥Í∏∞</button>
        <button class="btn" id="btnImport">ÏÑ§Ï†ï Î∂àÎü¨Ïò§Í∏∞</button>
        <button class="btn" id="btnReset">Í∏∞Î≥∏Í∞í Î≥µÏõê</button>
      </div>
    </details>
  </div>

  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jspdf@2.5.1/dist/jspdf.umd.min.js"></script>

  <script>
    const KR = n => (Number(n)||0).toLocaleString('ko-KR');
    const $ = sel => document.querySelector(sel);
    const el = (tag, attrs={}, children=[]) => {
      const d = document.createElement(tag);
      Object.entries(attrs).forEach(([k,v])=>{
        if(k==='class') d.className=v;
        else if(k==='text') d.textContent=v;
        else if(k==='value') d.value=v;
        else d.setAttribute(k,v);
      });
      children.forEach(c=>d.appendChild(c));
      return d;
    };

    // Í∏∞Î≥∏Í∞í 0 (ÏöîÏ≤≠ Î∞òÏòÅ)
    const DEF = {
      bizName:'', bizPhone:'', bizEmail:'',
      baseFee:0, baseDistanceKm:0, extraPerKm:0,
      noElevPerFloor:0, weekendRate:0, helperFee:0,
      items:[
        {id:'i1',label:'',price:0,unitLabel:'Í∞ú'},
        {id:'i2',label:'',price:0,unitLabel:'Í∞ú'},
        {id:'i3',label:'',price:0,unitLabel:'Í∞ú'},
        {id:'i4',label:'',price:0,unitLabel:'Í∞ú'}
      ]
    };
    const LSKEY = 'haul_embed_cfg_v2_zero_default';

    let CFG = loadCfg();
    let STATE = {
      distanceKm: 0, floors: 0, hasElevator: true, helpers: 0, weekend: false,
      items: Object.fromEntries((CFG.items||[]).map(i=>[i.id,0]))
    };

    function loadCfg(){ try{const raw=localStorage.getItem(LSKEY); if(raw) return JSON.parse(raw);}catch{} return JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(DEF)); }
    function saveCfg(){ try{localStorage.setItem(LSKEY, JSON.stringify(CFG));}catch{} }

    function itemsSum(){ return (CFG.items||[]).reduce((s,i)=> s + (Number(STATE.items[i.id]||0) * (Number(i.price)||0)), 0); }
    function calc(){
      const base = +CFG.baseFee || 0;
      const distExtra = Math.max(0, (+STATE.distanceKm||0) - (+CFG.baseDistanceKm||0)) * (+CFG.extraPerKm||0);
      const floorExtra = STATE.hasElevator ? 0 : Math.max(0, +STATE.floors||0) * (+CFG.noElevPerFloor||0);
      const helperExtra = (+STATE.helpers||0) * (+CFG.helperFee||0);
      const subtotal = base + itemsSum() + distExtra + floorExtra + helperExtra;
      const weekendMul = STATE.weekend ? (1 + (+CFG.weekendRate||0)) : 1;
      const total = Math.round(subtotal * weekendMul);

      $('#vBase').textContent   = KR(base) + 'Ïõê';
      $('#vItems').textContent  = KR(itemsSum()) + 'Ïõê';
      $('#vDist').textContent   = KR(distExtra) + 'Ïõê';
      $('#vFloor').textContent  = KR(floorExtra) + 'Ïõê';
      $('#vHelper').textContent = KR(helperExtra) + 'Ïõê';
      $('#vMul').textContent    = '√ó ' + weekendMul.toFixed(2);
      $('#vTotal').textContent  = KR(total) + 'Ïõê';
    }
    function refreshLabels(){ $('#cfgBaseKmLabel').textContent = CFG.baseDistanceKm; $('#cfgPerKmLabel').textContent = KR(CFG.extraPerKm); }

    function bindItems(){
      const wrap = $('#itemsList'); wrap.innerHTML='';
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach(it=>{
        const qty = +(STATE.items[it.id]||0);
        const row = el('div',{class:'item'},[
          el('div',{},[
            el('div',{text: (it.label||'(ÌíàÎ™©Î™Ö ÏßÅÏ†ë ÏûÖÎ†•)'), class:'title', style:'font-weight:600;font-size:14px'}),
            el('div',{text: (it.unitLabel||'Í∞ú') + 'Îãπ ' + KR(it.price) + 'Ïõê', class:'muted'})
          ]),
          el('div',{},[ el('input',{class:'input',type:'number',value:qty,id:'qty_'+it.id}) ])
        ]);
        wrap.appendChild(row);
        row.querySelector('input').addEventListener('input',e=>{ STATE.items[it.id]=+(e.target.value||0); calc(); });
      });
    }

    function bindAdmin(){
      $('#bizName').value=CFG.bizName||''; $('#bizPhone').value=CFG.bizPhone||''; $('#bizEmail').value=CFG.bizEmail||'';
      $('#cfgBaseFee').value=CFG.baseFee; $('#cfgBaseKm').value=CFG.baseDistanceKm; $('#cfgPerKm').value=CFG.extraPerKm;
      $('#cfgNoElev').value=CFG.noElevPerFloor; $('#cfgWeekend').value=CFG.weekendRate; $('#cfgHelper').value=CFG.helperFee;
      refreshLabels();

      const adminWrap = $('#adminItems'); adminWrap.innerHTML='';
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach((it, idx)=>{
        const row = el('div',{class:'row'},[
          el('input',{class:'input',value:it.label,placeholder:'ÌíàÎ™©Î™Ö'}),
          el('input',{class:'input',value:it.unitLabel||'Í∞ú',placeholder:'Îã®ÏúÑ(Í∞ú/ÎåÄ/ÏÑ∏Ìä∏ Îì±)'}),
          el('input',{class:'input',type:'number',value:it.price,placeholder:'Îã®Í∞Ä(Ïõê)'}),
          el('button',{class:'btn',text:'ÏÇ≠Ï†ú'})
        ]);
        const [iLabel,iUnit,iPrice,btnDel]=row.querySelectorAll('input,button');
        iLabel.addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.items[idx].label=e.target.value; saveCfg(); bindItems(); });
        iUnit.addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.items[idx].unitLabel=e.target.value; saveCfg(); bindItems(); });
        iPrice.addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.items[idx].price=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); bindItems(); });
        btnDel.addEventListener('click',()=>{ CFG.items.splice(idx,1); saveCfg(); bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc(); });
        adminWrap.appendChild(row);
      });
    }

    // Admin events
    $('#bizName').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.bizName=e.target.value; saveCfg(); });
    $('#bizPhone').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.bizPhone=e.target.value; saveCfg(); });
    $('#bizEmail').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.bizEmail=e.target.value; saveCfg(); });
    $('#cfgBaseFee').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.baseFee=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgBaseKm').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.baseDistanceKm=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); refreshLabels(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgPerKm').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.extraPerKm=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); refreshLabels(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgNoElev').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.noElevPerFloor=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgWeekend').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.weekendRate=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });
    $('#cfgHelper').addEventListener('input',e=>{ CFG.helperFee=+(e.target.value||0); saveCfg(); calc(); });

    // Items admin
    document.getElementById('addItem').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      const id='itm_'+Math.random().toString(36).slice(2,8);
      CFG.items.push({id,label:'',price:0,unitLabel:'Í∞ú'});
      saveCfg(); STATE.items[id]=0; bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc();
    });
    document.getElementById('applyItems').addEventListener('click',()=>{ saveCfg(); bindItems(); calc(); });
    document.getElementById('btnExport').addEventListener('click',async()=>{
      const text=JSON.stringify(CFG,null,2);
      try{ await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text); alert('ÏÑ§Ï†ïÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶ΩÎ≥¥ÎìúÏóê Î≥µÏÇ¨ÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.'); }
      catch{ alert(text); }
    });
    document.getElementById('btnImport').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      const text=prompt('Î∂ôÏó¨ÎÑ£Í∏∞ Ìï† ÏÑ§Ï†ï JSONÏùÑ ÏûÖÎ†•ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî:'); if(!text) return;
      try{ CFG=JSON.parse(text); saveCfg(); bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc(); }
      catch{ alert('JSON ÌååÏã± Ïã§Ìå®'); }
    });
    document.getElementById('btnReset').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      CFG=JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(DEF)); saveCfg(); bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc();
    });

    // customer inputs
    $('#distanceKm').addEventListener('input',e=>{ STATE.distanceKm=+(e.target.value||0); calc(); });
    $('#floors').addEventListener('input',e=>{ STATE.floors=+(e.target.value||0); calc(); });
    $('#helpers').addEventListener('input',e=>{ STATE.helpers=+(e.target.value||0); calc(); });

    function setElev(has){ STATE.hasElevator=has; $('#elevYes').classList.toggle('active',has); $('#elevNo').classList.toggle('active',!has); calc(); }
    document.getElementById('elevYes').addEventListener('click',()=>setElev(true));
    document.getElementById('elevNo').addEventListener('click',()=>setElev(false));

    function setWeekend(on){ STATE.weekend=on; $('#wkYes').classList.toggle('active',on); $('#wkNo').classList.toggle('active',!on); calc(); }
    document.getElementById('wkYes').addEventListener('click',()=>setWeekend(true));
    document.getElementById('wkNo').addEventListener('click',()=>setWeekend(false));

    // copy/share/pdf
    function buildQuoteText(){
      const date=new Date().toLocaleString();
      const itemsStr=(CFG.items||[])
        .map(i=>`${i.label||'(ÌíàÎ™©)'} ${STATE.items[i.id]||0}${i.unitLabel||'Í∞ú'}`)
        .filter(s=>!/ 0$/.test(s))
        .join('\n');

      const base=+CFG.baseFee||0;
      const distExtra=Math.max(0,(+STATE.distanceKm||0)-(+CFG.baseDistanceKm||0))*(+CFG.extraPerKm||0);
      const floorExtra=STATE.hasElevator?0:Math.max(0,+STATE.floors||0)*(+CFG.noElevPerFloor||0);
      const helperExtra=(+STATE.helpers||0)*(+CFG.helperFee||0);
      const subtotal=base+itemsSum()+distExtra+floorExtra+helperExtra;
      const weekendMul=STATE.weekend?(1+(+CFG.weekendRate||0)):1;
      const total=Math.round(subtotal*weekendMul);

      return [
        `[Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≤¨Ï†Å]`,
        `ÏùºÏãú: ${date}`,
        CFG.bizName?`ÏóÖÏ≤¥: ${CFG.bizName}`:null,
        CFG.bizPhone?`Ïó∞ÎùΩÏ≤ò: ${CFG.bizPhone}`:null,
        CFG.bizEmail?`Ïù¥Î©îÏùº: ${CFG.bizEmail}`:null,
        ``,
        `Í±∞Î¶¨(ÏôïÎ≥µ): ${STATE.distanceKm}km`,
        `Ï∏µÏàò: ${STATE.floors}Ï∏µ / ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ${STATE.hasElevator?'ÏûàÏùå':'ÏóÜÏùå'}`,
        `Î≥¥Ï°∞ Ïù∏Î†•: ${STATE.helpers}Î™Ö`,
        `Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ: ${STATE.weekend?'Ï†ÅÏö©':'ÎØ∏Ï†ÅÏö©'}`,
        ``,
        itemsStr?`ÌíàÎ™©:\n${itemsStr}`:`ÌíàÎ™©: ÏóÜÏùå`,
        ``,
        `ÏòàÏÉÅ Í≤∞Ï†ú Í∏àÏï°: ${KR(total)}Ïõê`,
        `(ÎåÄÌòïÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º Ïä§Ìã∞Ïª§ ÎπÑÏö© Î≥ÑÎèÑ ¬∑ ÎåÄÌñâ ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ ÏòàÏÉÅÍ∞Ä)`
      ].filter(Boolean).join('\n');
    }

    document.getElementById('btnCopy').addEventListener('click',async()=>{
      const text=buildQuoteText();
      try{ await navigator.clipboard.writeText(text); alert('Í≤¨Ï†Å ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶ΩÎ≥¥ÎìúÏóê Î≥µÏÇ¨ÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§.'); }
      catch{ alert(text); }
    });

    document.getElementById('btnShare').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      const text=buildQuoteText();
      if(navigator.share){ navigator.share({title:'Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≤¨Ï†Å',text}); }
      else{ alert('Ïù¥ Î∏åÎùºÏö∞Ï†ÄÎäî Í≥µÏú† Í∏∞Îä•ÏùÑ ÏßÄÏõêÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÏäµÎãàÎã§. Î≥µÏÇ¨ Í∏∞Îä•ÏùÑ Ïù¥Ïö©ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.'); }
    });

    document.getElementById('btnPDF').addEventListener('click',()=>{
      if(!window.jspdf){ alert('PDF ÎùºÏù¥Î∏åÎü¨Î¶¨Í∞Ä Î°úÎìúÎêòÏßÄ ÏïäÏïòÏäµÎãàÎã§.'); return; }
      const {jsPDF}=window.jspdf; const doc=new jsPDF(); const left=14; let y=20;
      doc.setFontSize(16); doc.text('Í∞ÄÏ†ï ÎåÄÌòï ÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º ÎÇ¥Î¶º ÎåÄÌñâ Í≤¨Ï†ÅÏÑú', left, y); y+=8;
      doc.setFontSize(11);
      const bizLine=[CFG.bizName,CFG.bizPhone,CFG.bizEmail].filter(Boolean).join('  ‚Ä¢  ');
      if(bizLine){ doc.text(bizLine,left,y); y+=8; }
      doc.text(`ÏûëÏÑ±ÏùºÏãú: ${new Date().toLocaleString()}`,left,y); y+=10;

      [['Í±∞Î¶¨(ÏôïÎ≥µ)',`${STATE.distanceKm} km`],
       ['Ï∏µÏàò/ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞',`${STATE.floors}Ï∏µ / ${STATE.hasElevator?'ÏóòÎ¶¨Î≤†Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏûàÏùå':'ÏóÜÏùå'}`],
       ['Î≥¥Ï°∞ Ïù∏Î†•',`${STATE.helpers} Î™Ö`],
       ['Ï£ºÎßê/ÏïºÍ∞Ñ',STATE.weekend?'Ï†ÅÏö©':'ÎØ∏Ï†ÅÏö©']]
       .forEach(r=>{ doc.text(`${r[0]}: ${r[1]}`,left,y); y+=7; });

      y+=3; doc.setFont(undefined,'bold'); doc.text('ÌíàÎ™©',left,y); doc.setFont(undefined,'normal'); y+=7;
      (CFG.items||[]).forEach(i=>{ const q=+STATE.items[i.id]||0; if(q>0){ doc.text(`- ${i.label||'(ÌíàÎ™©)'}: ${q}${i.unitLabel||'Í∞ú'}`,left,y); y+=6; } });

      const base=+CFG.baseFee||0, distExtra=Math.max(0,(+STATE.distanceKm||0)-(+CFG.baseDistanceKm||0))*(+CFG.extraPerKm||0);
      const floorExtra=STATE.hasElevator?0:Math.max(0,+STATE.floors||0)*(+CFG.noElevPerFloor||0);
      const helperExtra=(+STATE.helpers||0)*(+CFG.helperFee||0);
      const subtotal=base+itemsSum()+distExtra+floorExtra+helperExtra;
      const weekendMul=STATE.weekend?(1+(+CFG.weekendRate||0)):1;
      const total=Math.round(subtotal*weekendMul);

      y+=4; doc.setFont(undefined,'bold'); doc.text(`ÏòàÏÉÅ Í≤∞Ï†ú Í∏àÏï°: ${KR(total)}Ïõê`,left,y); doc.setFont(undefined,'normal'); y+=8;
      doc.setFontSize(10); doc.text('‚Äª ÏßÄÏûêÏ≤¥ ÎåÄÌòïÌèêÍ∏∞Î¨º Ïä§Ìã∞Ïª§ ÎπÑÏö©ÏùÄ Î≥ÑÎèÑ(Ïã§ÎπÑ)ÏûÖÎãàÎã§.', left, y);
      doc.save('Í≤¨Ï†ÅÏÑú.pdf');
    });

    // Ï¥àÍ∏∞Ìôî
    function postHeight(){ try{ var h=document.documentElement.scrollHeight; parent.postMessage({type:'CALC_RESIZE',height:h},'*'); }catch(e){} }
    function init(){ bindAdmin(); bindItems(); calc(); postHeight(); }
    window.addEventListener('load', init);
    window.addEventListener('resize', postHeight);
    setTimeout(postHeight, 300);

    // Í∞ÑÎã® ÌÖåÏä§Ìä∏
    (function(){
      try{
        const t = buildQuoteText();
        console.assert(t.includes('ÏòàÏÉÅ Í≤∞Ï†ú Í∏àÏï°'), 'Í∏àÏï° Ï§Ñ ÎàÑÎùΩ');
        const id0 = CFG.items[0].id; STATE.items[id0]=2;
        const t2 = buildQuoteText();
        console.assert(t2.includes('2'), 'ÌíàÎ™© ÏàòÎüâ Î∞òÏòÅ Ïã§Ìå®');
      }catch(e){ console.warn('Dev test Ïã§Ìå®', e); }
    })();
  </script>
</body>
</html>

ÏóÖÎ°úÎìú Ï≤¥ÌÅ¨Î¶¨Ïä§Ìä∏

  • Í≤ΩÎ°úÍ∞Ä Ï†ïÌôïÌûà -2/index.html Ïù∏ÏßÄ ÌôïÏù∏

  • ÏóÖÎ°úÎìú ÌõÑ Ï†ëÏÜçÏùÄ https://jsh0333.github.io/-2/?v=1 Ï≤òÎüº ?v=1ÏùÑ Î∂ôÏó¨ Ï∫êÏãú Î¨¥Î†•Ìôî

  • GitHub Ï†ÄÏû•ÏÜå Settings ‚Üí Pages ÏóêÏÑú SourceÍ∞Ä main / root Ïù∏ÏßÄ ÌôïÏù∏

ÌïÑÏöîÌïòÏãúÎ©¥ Ï†úÍ∞Ä ÏÉÅÌò∏/Ïó∞ÎùΩÏ≤ò/Ïù¥Î©îÏùº Í∏∞Î≥∏Í∞íÏùÑ Î∞ïÏùÄ Î≤ÑÏ†ÑÎèÑ ÎßåÎì§Ïñ¥ ÎìúÎ¶¥Í≤åÏöî.


ChatGPTÎäî Ïã§ÏàòÎ•º Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ï§ëÏöîÌïú Ï†ïÎ≥¥Îäî Ïû¨Ï∞® ÌôïÏù∏ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî.
